languages.text: Истовые моления были услышаны. Носители самых ярких огней в глазах пали замертво, услышав гимны во славу Бога-Императора, а прочие слегли с тяжелой болезнью, не проходившей до выхода из варпа.

traits.locale_text: Истовые моления были услышаны. Носители самых ярких огней в глазах пали замертво, услышав гимны во слову Бога-Императора, а прочие слегли с тяжелой болезнью, не проходившей до выхода из варпа.

languages.text: The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.
languages.original_text: Истовые моления были услышаны. Носители самых ярких огней в глазах пали замертво, услышав гимны во славу Бога-Императора, а прочие слегли с тяжелой болезнью, не проходившей до выхода из варпа.

traits.locale_text: The fervent prayers were answered. The bearers of the brightest fires dropped dead upon hearing the paean to the God-Emperor, and the rest were struck with a severe sickness that would not relent until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

The fervent prayers were answered. The bearers of the brightest fires dropped dead upon hearing the paean to the God-Emperor, and the rest were struck with a severe sickness that would not relent until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

languages.text: 船员们热切的祷告得到了回应。那些虹膜最亮的人一听到神皇的赞美诗后就倒地而死，而其余的人则生了重病，直到飞船离开灵魂之海之后才有所缓解。
languages.original_text: The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: 船员们热切的祷告得到了回应。那些虹膜最亮的人一听到神皇的赞美诗后就倒地而死，而其余的人则生了重病，直到飞船离开灵魂之海之后才有所缓解。

languages.text: Las fervientes plegarias de la tripulación fueron escuchadas. Los que llevaban los iris más luminosos murieron al oír el himno al Dios Emperador, mientras que el resto enfermó gravemente y no remitió hasta que la nave abandonó el Mar de Almas.
languages.original_text: The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: Las fervientes plegarias de la tripulación fueron escuchadas. Los que llevaban los iris más luminosos murieron al oír el himno al Dios Emperador, mientras que el resto enfermó gravemente y no remitió hasta que la nave abandonó el Mar de las Almas.

languages.text: クルーの懸命な祈りが届いた。目の虹彩が最も明るい者は、神帝陛下への賛美歌を聞くと命を落とし、他の者達は重い病に襲われ、船が魂の海を抜けるとその病も治った。
languages.original_text: The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: クルーの懸命な祈りが届いた。目の虹彩が最も明るい者は、神帝陛下への賛美歌を聞くと命を落とし、他の者達は重い病に襲われ、船が魂の海を抜けるとその病も治った。

languages.text: Les ferventes prières de l'équipage portent leurs fruits. L'hymne à l'Empereur-Dieu tue instantanément les personnes les plus affectées, tandis que les autres tombent gravement malades et ne s'en remettent que lorsque le vaisseau quitte la Mer des Âmes.
languages.original_text: The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: Les ferventes prières de l'équipage portent leurs fruits. L'hymne à l'Empereur-Dieu tue instantanément les personnes les plus affectées, tandis que les autres tombent gravement malades et ne s'en remettent que lorsque le vaisseau quitte la Mer des Âmes.

languages.text: Die leidenschaftlichen Gebete der Crew wurden beantwortet. Alle mit leuchtenden Augen brechen tot zusammen, als sie die Hymne des Gottimperators hören, während die anderen von einer schweren Krankheit befallen werden, die erst nachlässt, als das Schiff das Meer der Seelen verlässt.
languages.original_text: The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: Die leidenschaftlichen Gebete der Crew wurden beantwortet. Alle mit leuchtenden Augen brechen tot zusammen, als sie die Hymne des Gottimperators hören, während die anderen von einer schweren Krankheit befallen werden, die erst nachlässt, als das Schiff das Meer der Seelen verlässt.

languages.text: Mürettebatın içten duaları karşılık buldu. Gözleri en çok parlayanlar, Tanrı İmparator'a adanmış ilahiyi duyduklarında can verdi. Diğerleri ise gemi Ruhlar Denizi'nden çıkana kadar süren, şiddetli bir hastalığa yakalandı.
languages.original_text: The crew's fervent prayers were answered. Those bearing the most luminous irises dropped dead upon hearing the hymn to the God-Emperor, while the rest were struck with a severe sickness which did not abate until the vessel left the Sea of Souls.
